name: Wally World
overview: Here we have Wally World, Created by Richard Langford in 1992 – A quite awesome platformer which has some very nice Title Screen Music (Puppet on a string), along with a Great Starting Animation, and Great Gameplay throughout! When you start, You see a happy scene with Wally and a Girl dancing, then Lightning appears, and a huge dragon kidnaps the Girl, so Wally jumps in disgust, and thats where the Game Starts You (as Wally) have to rescue your Girl, your aim is to jump over objects like Robots, Flying Green things, Balls what drop down from the ceiling, and many other enemies who will drain your Energy Bar, once that is depleted, You lose a life, and you only appear to have 2 chances
